text.listBibl:
References:
 
        1. Esteban et al., MRIQC: Advancing the automatic prediction of image quality in MRI from unseen sites, Plos ONE e0184661, 2017.
 doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0184661 ; 

        2. Kurtzer et al., Singularity: scientific containers for mobility of compute, Plos ONE e0177459, 2017.
 doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0177459 ; 

        3. Gorgolewski et al., OpenNeuro -a free online platform for sharing and analysis of neuroimaging data, OHBM, p1677,
 Vancouver, BC, Canada, 2017. 

        4. https://github.com/poldracklab/mriqc/blob/master/notebooks/MRIQC%20Web%20API.ipynb ; 

        5. Shehzad Z et al. The
 Preprocessed Connectomes Project Quality Assessment Protocol-a resource for measuring the quality of MRI data. In: Front. Neurosci. Conf.
 Neuroinformatics. Cairns, Australia; 2015.
